name: Words I want to say to you piles up (Ratima Chandrema)
name_original: Words I want to say to you piles up (Ratima Chandrema)
description:
Words I want to say to you piles up

|| Description ||

This is a non-commercial project, made for SAE GAME JAM 2021. I do not earn any profit from this in anyway.

Seina, a young japanese girl fell in love with her best friend, Yuu. She has been overthinking of many scenarios  how to confess her love. 

Plays in Seina's perspective, feels her nervous and excitement during this Doki doki moment. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

|| Dev Notes ||

  •  There are 4 slightly different endings. 
  • The loading to open the game first time is slow 2-3 mins.  

Mobile Users

  • The game has been tested on Chrome Browser on  SamsungGlalaxy9 and worked fine.
  •  you might be able to play the game on your mobile depends on the models and browser 
  • Try it on Google Chrome Browser. (some said it is not working in Safari ) 
  • Do not mind the warning below. 
"Please note that Unity WebGL is not currently supported on mobiles. Press OK if you wish to continue anyway"

DON'T mind that and click "OK". 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
